page.title: 10A Day in the Life:-
page.content:
The weekend was here at last.It was 9. 00 a.m.when I woke up because my mum called and said breakfast was on the table.That wasn't the normal time I get up or have my breakfast.The reason why mum got me up was because I was going to East Lane market with my cousin and her friends.East Lane'sells all of things.After I got washed and got ready my cousin Nicola came and knocked on my door to see if I was ready.We got two buses down to East Lane.A 161 up to Eltham then a 21a up to East Lane.We had a look around for a while,then we decided to get some things. Soon we all started to get tired so we all went home by the same buses again.That was Saturday 22nd of June 1985
Paula Holmes-St Thomas More School.
